titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable Sir Patience Ward Knight, Lord Mayor of the City of London. The humble petition of the commons of the city of London, in Common-hall assembled, June 27. 1681
titleStmt.author: Ward, Patience, Sir, 1629-1696.
Bethel, Slingsby, 1617-1697.
Cornish, Henry, d. 1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Baldwyn, in the Old-baily,

notesStmt.note: The verso contains a petition from the citizens to the sheriffs of the city of London and Middlesex, Slingsby Bethel and Henry Cornish.
Reproduction of the original in the Guildhall Library, London.
